descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Bam Adebayo with the massive stuff at the rim

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam Adebayo with the massive stuff at the rim) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam Adebayo with the massive stuff at the rim

videos.description: Tyler Herro tosses a lob to Bam Adebayo, who gets some serious air to flush the two-handed alley-oop.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam skies for the alley-oop) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam skies for the alley-oop

videos.description: Quentin Grimes comes off a screen awkwardly and goes down grabbing his knee in pain.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Grimes goes down with an injury) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Grimes goes down with an injury

videos.description: Kyle Lowry tosses a lob up to Omer Yurtseven, who barely tips the ball to guide it into the basket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (How did Omer Yurtseven make this tip-in?) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: How did Omer Yurtseven make this tip-in?

videos.description: RJ Barrett somehow gets the and-1 to fall

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (RJ Barrett somehow gets the and-1 to fall) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: RJ Barrett somehow gets the and-1 to fall

videos.description: RJ Barrett catches fire in the first half as he puts up 30 points trying to keep the Knicks in it against the Heat.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (RJ Barrett goes off for 30 points in 1st half) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: RJ Barrett goes off for 30 points in 1st half

videos.description: Bam Adebayo kicks it out to P.J. Tucker who knocks down the 3-pointer from the corner.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam finds Tucker for corner 3) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam finds Tucker for corner 3

videos.description: Tyler Herro gets the steal, setting up Caleb Martin for the and-1 bucket on the fast break.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Herro's steal sets up Martin bucket) 2022/02/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Herro's steal sets up Martin bucket
